ssot__FlowElement__dlm.name: Flow Element
ssot__FlowElement__dlm.description: The Flow Element DMO represents the details about a single element within a flow version.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Flow Element DMO.

ssot__FlowVersionId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated flow version of the flow element.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the flow element.
